summary: THE FLIMSY PLASTIC CLIPS THAT HOLD THE WINDOWS TO THE TRACK OF THE POWER DOOR WINDOWS ARE A HAZARD. THEY BRAKE EXTREMELY EASY AND COULD LEAVE A PERSON TRAPPED INSIDE THE CAR IN A EVENT OF NOT BEING ABLE TO OPEN THE DOOR. OUR VAN IS CURRENTLY DISABLED TO THE PLASTIC RETAINER CLIP BRAKING. AS AN ENGINEER MYSELF I AM APPALLED AT THE POOR DESIGN. I'M SURE THE DESIGN WAS CHEAP TO MANUFACTURE, BUT ITS TOTALLY INCAPABLE OF SURVIVING ANY STRESS. *TS   ****DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS***761559
